name: In Arms of Static
description:
In Arms of Static is a surrealist game that focuses on narrative through strange images and scenarios inspired by the La La Land games made by Matt Aldridge. Everything in the game was made by me. The game has six unique endings and takes around 40 minutes to an hour to play through entirely. 

Controls: W A S D for movement, E to interact, ESC to instantly quit the game.
Soundtrack
Tools: GameMaker Studio,  Audacity,  MuseScore 3.

Thanks for playing.
